alert.note: Alert for Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 21 at 5:46PM CDT until March 21 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Williamson County in south central Texas... Northeastern Travis County in south central Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 545 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Florence to near Anderson Mill, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Austin, Round Rock, Cedar Park, Georgetown, Pflugerville, Taylor, Granger, Anderson Mill, Serenada, Windemere, Leander, Hutto, Bartlett, Liberty Hill, Jarrell, Florence, Thrall, Weir, Georgetown Dam and Granger Dam. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
